Articles.Content: Finally I have gotten a forum account. In KSP I like big. I like recreating things in ksp especially trains. I got kip when 0.23 was just released. So yay I'm on the forums.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Welcome aboard conductor. Wait until 1.1 starts getting close. Your train skills will be needed.

Hello Spacetraindriver, and welcome to the forums!

We have a number of train enthusiasts around here.

Happy landings!
Welcome! You might want to see Union\_pacific, too.
